orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Master Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Master Color Wheel.

Turn = Master Brightness
Tilt X = Master Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Master Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Shadows Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Shadows Color Wheel.

Turn = Shadows Brightness
Tilt X = Shadows Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Shadows Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Midtones Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Midtones Color Wheel.

Turn = Midtones Brightness
Tilt X = Midtones Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Midtones Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Highlights Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Highlights Color Wheel.

Turn = Highlights Brightness
Tilt X = Highlights Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Highlights Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Timeline.Jog (1 frame)
orbiter.info:
Turn to move through the timeline frame-by-frame.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: Timeline.Jog (10 frames)
orbiter.info:
Turn to move through the timeline by 10 frames at a time.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: Timeline.Nudge (1 frame)
orbiter.info:
Turn to nudge the selected clip frame-by-frame.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: Timeline.Nudge (10 frames)
orbiter.info:
Turn to nudge the selected clip by 10 frames at a time.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: timeline-scroll
orbiter.info:
Turn = Timeline Scroll (Horizontal)
Tilt = Timeline Scroll (Horizontal & Vertical)
orbiter.label: Timeline.Scroll

orbiter.name: timeline-scroll-zoom
orbiter.label: Timeline.Scroll & Zoom
orbiter.info:
Turn = Timeline Zoom
Tilt = Timeline Scroll

orbiter.name: timeline-scroll-skim
orbiter.info:
Turn & Tilt X = Scroll horizontally and skim
Tilt Y = Scroll vertically
orbiter.label: Timeline.Scroll & Skim
